text: Kudos to @NYGovCuomo and @johnmcdonald108 for listening to advocates resulting in an executive order to ensure that #hydroxychloroquine and #chloroquine are only given for FDA-approved indication or #COVID19 state-approved trial. #lupus #autoimmune @LupusUpstateNY @LupusOrg https://t.co/lJsGsYpNiV
